resources.string:
App package: %1$s
Current App version: %2$s

URL to APK: %3$s
Version URL: %4$s

Check new App version every: %5$s at: %6$s.

Last successfull auto-update: %7$s
Days in the week to check for update
Select days of the week in which the app checks if new update is available.
Time of the day to check for update
Set time for selected days in which the app checks if new update is available.
Set maximum retry attempts for update after failure. Retry occurs every hour.
Set the URL where your new installation APK file is located.
Set the URL where your TXT version file is located. Version in this file must be same as a versionCode in the APK file.
Set unique package name of the app which will be reinstalled. Package must be same as package defined in the APK file.
Either the su binary could not be found or you did not allow root permission for this application.\n\nThis can happen when your device is not rooted.
To run this application BussyBox must be installed on this device.
Unable to download APK file from url! Reason: %1$s.
Unable to install new APK file!
Unable to delete old APK files!
Unable to download actual version from URL: %1$s!
Unable to parse actual version from URL: %1$s! URL must point to actual APK version as simple number.
Unable to find app with package %1$s. App is probbably not installed.
App with package: %1$s was successfully reinstalled with version: %2$s.
